borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: <p>The development hereby approved shall only be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:</p><p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif">- 1912-PL1-01 Site Location&nbsp;<br>- 1912-PL1-02 Block Plan<br>- 1912-Pl1-03 Proposed Outbuilding</span></span><br></p><p>No other drawings or documents apply.</p>

<p class="paragraph" style="margin-top:0cm;margin-right:18.75pt;margin-bottom:
0cm;margin-left:0cm;text-align:justify;vertical-align:baseline"><span class="normaltextrun"><span style="font-size:11.0pt;font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif">Prior
to above ground works details of the materials proposed for the hardstanding or provisions to direct water run-off from the hardstanding shall be
submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The
development hereby approved shall be constructed in accordance with the
approved materials or provisions.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>
<p>All new windows located on a wall or slope forming a side elevation shall be finished in obscure-glaze. Windows less than 1.7 metres above floor level shall be non-openable.&nbsp;</p>

The outbuilding hereby approved shall only be used for purposes incidental to the enjoyment of the dwellinghouse as such. It shall not be used for purposes conflicting with the use of the property as a single dwellinghouse, and in particular it shall not be used as a separate unit of accommodation.
The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the development hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing dwellinghouse.
The development hereby permitted shall be commenced before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
description: Construction of a single storey outbuilding
